message.name: ERR_XFV_TIME_MANDATORY
message.locale: 'Time Attended' and/or 'Time Absent' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_HOURS
message.locale: The number of hours (%1n) must be between 0 and 24.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_MINUTES
message.locale: The number of minutes (%1n) must be between 0 and 59.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_EXPECTED_UNITS
message.locale: The number of expected units, %1n, must be greater than or equal to 0.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_ATTENDED_UNITS
message.locale: The number of attended units, %1n, must be greater than or equal to 0.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_UNATTENDED_UNITS
message.locale: The number of unattended units, %1n, must be greater than or equal to 0.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ABSENT_REASON_EMPTY
message.locale: An 'Absent Reason' must be entered if 'Time Absent' is recorded.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRESS_REASON_EMPTY
message.locale: A 'Progress Reason' must be entered if 'Progress' is recorded.

message.name: ERR_FV_SERVICE_DATE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The service date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_MAX_TIME_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The time entered must be less than or equal to 24 hours.
